product_name: Taj Mahal Tea 500 g: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: Actual MRP printed on the carton inclusive of all taxes is ₹255. But in the listing it is shown as ₹265 and offered some discount. It is cheating

reviews.review_title: Making tea is like good poetry
reviews.review_body: Top notch  tea.another brook bond product.  Making tea is like good poetry.  It is not just about the tea leaves. It about the proportionate mixing of water, milk and sugar along with tea.We indians love  our chai;drink chai spread happiness and peace
Delivered on time and product quantity is nice. Love this tea smell and taste..
taj mahal should sell the same quality that they sell in the US... drank this for over 20 years, but year after year their quality was detoriating... and now it is the worst

reviews.review_title: Aroma, taste and package - all in one!
reviews.review_body: To make one cup of tea, use half cup of milk with half cup of water and add 2 - 2.5 teaspoons of this Taj Mahal chai Patti - and add 1 teaspoon of sugar.I've been doing this since 6 months now and am absolutely in love with the smell and taste of this tea!I would say, go for it!

This is duplicate DONT BUY...See the image... Mixed with some crazy stuff.. Used taj mahal tea for over 20 years.., it was not vacuumed sealed.. I knew something was wrong before i opened.. But cannot return so opened

reviews.review_title: Seems Amazon selling Duplicate Tajmahal or Tajmahal tea have now their standard lowered
reviews.review_body: It seems Now Amazon is selling Duplicate Tajmahal  such a waste of Money now can't even return. It's 3rd class
Looks like it's not original/genuine product.The taste is not as what it should have.Please check it.
